ValidationRule.description: If value is over between 100 - 250 an ops manager in derby must be selected Josh Bolsover, Natasha Payne or Georgiana Balan

AND (OR($User.Department = "Derby",$User.Department = "Bucharest"),
(AND( Write_Off_Amount__c > 100 , Write_Off_Amount__c < 250, ISPICKVAL(Currency__c, "GBP")) || AND( Write_Off_Amount__c > 100 , Write_Off_Amount__c < 285, ISPICKVAL(Currency__c, "EUR")) || AND( Write_Off_Amount__c > 100 , Write_Off_Amount__c < 320, ISPICKVAL(Currency__c, "USD")) ),
TEXT(Who_Gave_Vocal_Authorisation__c)<> "Josh Bolsover", TEXT(Who_Gave_Vocal_Authorisation__c)<> "Disruption", TEXT(Who_Gave_Vocal_Authorisation__c)<> "Adrian Hobjila", TEXT(Who_Gave_Vocal_Authorisation__c)<> "Natasha Payne" )
